T02D3057:109b-0: @109b # // 'phags pa rta mgrin bsgrub par 'dod pas thog mar sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D3057:109b-1: aom sva bh'a bi shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba
T02D3057:109b-2: bi shuddhonyahom zhes lan gsum mam bdun brjod pas snang
T02D3057:109b-3: srid kyi dngos po 'di thams cad dag par bsam
T02D3057:109b-4: mo // khyad par du bdag gi lus shel sgong
T02D3057:109b-5: dag pa lta bur rnam par dag par bsam mo
T02D3057:109b-6: mo // // de nas rang gi snying gar ram
T02D3057:109b-7: ser po cig las 'od 'phros shing 'dus pa las
T02D3057:109b-9: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge hr'i: dmar po cig bsam mo //
T02D3057:109b-10: de las 'od zer zhags pa lta bu dang lcags
T02D3057:109b-11: kyu lta bu phyogs bcur 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang
T02D3057:109b-12: byang chub sems dpa' dpal rta mgrin dang bla ma
T02D3057:109b-13: la sogs pa mdun du spyan drangs la rang gi
T02D3057:109b-14: snying ga'i yi ge hr'i: las mchod pa'i lha mo
T02D3057:109b-15: bdug spos ma phyag na spos thogs pa dang /
T02D3057:109b-16: me tog ma phyag na autpa la thogs pa dang /
T02D3057:109b-17: mar me ma phyag na rin po che'i sgron me thogs pa dang /
T02D3057:109b-18: dri chab ma gser gyi bum pa'i nang du ga pur gyi chus bkang ba thogs pa dang /
T02D3057:110a-1: gyi gzhong pa'i nang du bdud rtsi ri rab tsam
T02D3057:110a-2: thogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D3057:110a-3: dpa' dang dpal rta mgrin dang bla ma la sogs
T02D3057:110a-4: pa la mchod la sngags 'di rnams brjod do //
T02D3057:110a-5: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3057:110a-6: aom badzra pushpe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3057:110a-7: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3057:110a-8: aom badzra gandhe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3057:110a-9: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3057:110a-10: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D3057:110a-11: gang yang bdag gis dus kun du //
T02D3057:110a-12: sdig pa bgyis par gang gyur pa //
T02D3057:110a-14: deng nas brtsams nas 'byung mi bgyid //
T02D3057:110a-15: dge ba rnams la rjes yi rang //
T02D3057:110a-16: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3057:110a-17: thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
T02D3057:110a-18: de thob lam la gnas bgyid cing //
T02D3057:110a-19: dam pa'i skyabs gsum la skyabs mchi //
T02D3057:110a-24: tshangs pa'i gnas rnams rim gyis bsgom /
T02D3057:110a-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02D3057:110a-26: zhes lan gsum brjod la ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur stong par bsam /
T02D3057:110a-27: de nas nam mkha'i dkyil du ram ser po las
T02D3057:110a-28: 'od 'phros pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor cig bsam
T02D3057:110a-29: / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um mthing
T02D3057:110a-30: ga las 'od 'phros pa las rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D3057:110a-31: / pa cig bsam / rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D3057:110a-32: de las 'od phyogs bcur 'phros pas rdo rje'i ra
T02D3057:110a-33: ba dang dra ba sa gzhi gur du bsam /
T02D3057:110a-34: rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3057:110a-35: gyi steng du yi ge bhr'um dkar po cig bsam
T02D3057:110a-36: / de las 'od 'phros pas shar phyogs dngul las grub pa /
T02D3057:110a-37: lho bee d'urya las grub pa /
T02D3057:110a-38: nub shel dmar po las grub pa /
T02D3057:110a-41: gser gyi ka ba brgyad kyis bteg pa rin po che bee d'urya'i ljon shing gis steng phub pa /
T02D3057:110a-42: rin po che'i 'phan du ma 'phyang ba'i gzhal yas khang du bsgom pa'am ;
T02D3057:110a-43: yang na thod pa'i gzhal yas khang stong gsum gyi
T02D3057:110a-44: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya khyon
T02D3057:110a-45: tsam / steng zhing chen gyi g-yang gzhis bkab pa /
T02D3057:110a-47: seng ldeng gi ka ba brgyad la thod pas gsum
T02D3057:110a-48: pa'i [?] brgyad kyis bteg pa phyi nas bltas na
T02D3057:110b-1: nang nas bltas na phyi gsal ba'i gzhal yas khang cig tu bsgom mo //
T02D3057:110b-2: sgrub pa po rang gi sems yi ge ram cig tu bsgom /
T02D3057:110b-3: ram ser po de las 'od 'phros shing 'dus pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor cig bsgom /
T02D3057:110b-4: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang hr'i: dmar po cig tu bsgom /
T02D3057:110b-5: hr'i: dmar po de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas sems can gyi don byas /
T02D3057:110b-6: 'phags pa mchod nas slar 'od de yi ge hr'i:
T02D3057:110b-7: la thim pas hr'i: de nyid 'od du zhu ba
T02D3057:110b-8: las tshe thog ma med pa nas nyon mongs pa
T02D3057:110b-9: dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad ye shes kyi
T02D3057:110b-11: ye shes kyi me 'od 'phros pa dang /
T02D3057:110b-12: 'dus pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbu gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D3057:110b-18: dbu gsum gyi steng na rta mgo ljang gu gsum yod pa /
T02D3057:110b-19: tshems gtsigs pa zhal re re nas kyang 'brug stong stong ldir ba /
T02D3057:110b-20: thod pa skam po lnga'i thod can /
T02D3057:110b-21: thod pa rlon pa'i phreng bas se ral khar brgyan pa /
T02D3057:110b-22: sbrul dkar nag gis yan lag brgyan pa /
T02D3057:110b-23: stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs byas pa /
T02D3057:110b-24: glang po che'i ko rlon gos su gyon pa /
T02D3057:110b-25: phyag drug la g-yas pa dang po rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02D3057:110b-26: g-yon dang po na dung chen khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa /
T02D3057:110b-27: g-yas gnyis pa na gser gyi zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D3057:110b-28: g-yas tha ma na seng ldeng gi dbyug tho bsnams pa /
T02D3057:110b-29: g-yon gnyis pa na ral gri / g-yon gyi tha
T02D3057:110b-30: ma na sor mo lnga la mthe bo che nas
T02D3057:110b-31: bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bya khyung ga ru
T02D3057:110b-32: da dkar po bye ba 'gyed pa /
T02D3057:110b-33: mdzub mo nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi mthing ga bye ba 'gyed pa /
T02D3057:110b-34: gung mo nas rin po che'i rigs kyi ser po bye ba 'gyed pa /
T02D3057:110b-35: srin lag nas padma'i rigs kyi dmar po bye ba 'gyed pa /
T02D3057:110b-36: mthe chung nas las kyi rigs ljang gu bye ba 'gyed pa /
T02D3057:110b-37: zhabs drug gis klu thams cad brdzis pa /
T02D3057:110b-38: rdo rje'i gshog pa re re nas bya khyung ga
T02D3057:110b-39: ru da bsam gyis mi khyab pa bye ba 'gyed
T02D3057:110b-40: pa / bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i ye shes kyi me'i klong dkyil na bzhugs par bsam /
T02D3057:110b-41: yang na bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po /
T02D3057:111a-1: na seng ldeng gi dbyug to /
T02D3057:111a-2: phyag g-yon pa na sdigs mdzub 'phyar ba /
T02D3057:111a-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa phyag mtshan bsgom /
T02D3057:111a-4: lce rdo rje rtse lnga par bsgoms la /
T02D3057:111a-5: sarba ka ri zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru rdo rje rtse lnga pa la dgod /
T02D3057:111a-6: snying ga g-yon par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsam /
T02D3057:111a-7: snying ga g-yas par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rgya gram ljang gu cig bsam /
T02D3057:111a-8: spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom dkar po cig bsam /
T02D3057:111a-9: mgrin par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a'a: dmar po cig bsam /
T02D3057:111a-10: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um mthing gcig bsam /
T02D3057:111a-11: snying ga'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa las 'od kha dog lnga pa lcags kyu lta bu 'phros /
T02D3057:111a-12: bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3057:111a-16: don yod grub pa de rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la /
T02D3057:111a-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis aom zhes
T02D3057:111a-18: pas bdud rtsi'i chus spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar
T02D3057:111a-19: bsam / h'um zhes pas mi 'khrugs pas dpral pa nas dbang bskur bar bsam /
T02D3057:111a-20: tr'am zhes pas rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rna ba g-yas pa nas dbang bskur bar bsam ;
T02D3057:111a-21: hr'i: zhes pas snang ba mtha' yas kyis ltag pa nas dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D3057:111a-22: aa zhes pas rna ba g-yon pa nas don yod grub pas bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D3057:111a-23: snying ga'i rdo rje rgya gram las 'od zer lcags
T02D3057:111a-24: kyu lta bu 'phros pas de nas grub pa'i dpal
T02D3057:111a-25: rta mgrin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa cig
T02D3057:111a-26: spyan drangs la / rgya gram ljang gu las 'od
T02D3057:111a-27: 'phros pas mchod pa'i lha mo lnga byung bas snga
T02D3057:111a-28: ma bzhin du mchod par bya'o //
T02D3057:111a-29: rgya gram gyi chang ba la dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D3057:111a-30: bsams la dza: las 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus
T02D3057:111a-31: dpal rta mgrin spyan drangs la /
T02D3057:111a-32: h'um las 'od 'phros pas ye shes sems dpa' la phog pas bdag la zhugs /
T02D3057:111a-34: ho: las 'od 'phros pas ye shes sems dpa' dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs par bsam /
T02D3057:111a-35: sku la gtad la bsgom pas dub na sa bon
T02D3057:111a-36: gyi yi ge la gtad la sngags 'di bzlas so
T02D3057:111b-0: // aom badzra kro dha ha ya @111b gr'i ba
T02D3057:111b-1: hu lu hu lu h'um phat ces ci mang du
T02D3057:111b-2: // bzlas so // sa bon gyi yi ge las
T02D3057:111b-3: 'od 'phros pas nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad
T02D3057:111b-4: la 'phags pa rta mgrin du gyur par bsam /
T02D3057:111b-5: bzlas pas dub na ye shes pa mdun du bton
T02D3057:111b-6: la lha mo lngas snga ma bzhin du mchod do
T02D3057:111b-7: // tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa bzlas /
T02D3057:111b-8: 'phags pa rta mgrin la bstod pa /
T02D3057:111b-9: h'um sku mdog chags med nub kha'i dmar thag 'dra //
T02D3057:111b-10: 'bar ba'i dbul ral ba gyen du brdzes //
T02D3057:111b-11: ma rig tshangs pa kha sbub gnon pa'i lha //
T02D3057:111b-12: padma rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3057:111b-13: ye shes ha ya gri ba rta mchog dpal //
T02D3057:111b-14: zhal nas 'brug stong di ri ri //
T02D3057:111b-15: tshems gtsigs tsam na tshems nang nas //
T02D3057:111b-16: gdug pa'i me stag kham kham 'bar //
T02D3057:111b-17: khro rgyal dbang gi rta skad tser tser mtsher //
T02D3057:111b-19: mkhyen par gshegs par bya ba'i phyir dza: dza: zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02D3057:111b-20: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3057:111b-21: bdag nyid rta mgrin du bsgoms pa'i snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3057:111b-22: de'i steng du yi ge hr'i: dmar po las phyogs bcur 'od 'phros te /
T02D3057:111b-23: phyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang nang bcud kyi 'jig
T02D3057:111b-24: rten la phog pas 'od du zhu nas kun rta
T02D3057:111b-26: 'od de dag thams cad rang gi lus la bsdu /
T02D3057:111b-27: dam tshig sems dpa' ye shes sems dpa'i rta mgrin dmar po la bsdu /
T02D3057:111b-28: hr'i: dmar po thig le dkar zhing 'tsher ba yungs kar tsam cig la bsdu /
T02D3057:111b-29: yungs kar tsam po de yang mi dmigs par bsgom
T02D3057:111b-30: ste gsal la mi rtog pa cig tu bsgom mo
T02D3057:111b-32: rdo rje rtse lnga pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod pa bya /
T02D3057:111b-33: lha klu mthu bo che thams cad dbang du sdud
T02D3057:111b-34: par 'dod na dung chen thogs pa'i phyag la mchod
T02D3057:111b-35: pa bya / bdag dang gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi
T02D3057:111b-36: bar 'dod na zhags pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod
T02D3057:111b-37: pa bya / pa bya / byis pa'i gdon bco brgyad dang /
T02D3057:111b-38: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang /
T02D3057:111b-39: lha 'dre ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar 'dod
T02D3057:111b-40: na ral gri thogs pa'i phyag la mchod pa bya
T02D3057:111b-41: / lha 'dre mthu bo che thams cad bran bzhin du 'khol bar 'dod na /
T02D3057:111b-42: seng ldeng gi rta thogs pa'i phyag la mchod pa bya /
T02D3057:111b-43: klu ma rungs pa thams cad gdul bar 'dod na /
T02D3057:112a-2: chu grong khyer ram yul du byung ba bzlog par 'dod na /
T02D3057:112a-3: seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa la rta
T02D3057:112a-4: mgrin gyi sngags sngon du 'bum bsnyen pa byas la
T02D3057:112a-5: las kyi dus su yang 'bum byas te btab na
T02D3057:112a-7: shva bzlog par 'dod na brangs dang lcags la 'brug
T02D3057:112a-8: gi gzugs bris la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor
T02D3057:112a-9: brgyad pa cig la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab la
T02D3057:112a-10: shva sar btab na bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02D3057:112a-11: ser ba bsrung bar 'dod na yungs kar la sngags
T02D3057:112a-12: brgya rtsa brgyad btab la yungs kar la cha'i nang
T02D3057:112a-13: du dril la phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dkyil dang dgu
T02D3057:112a-14: ru sba / gdong zlog la bye ma la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la 'brug dang /
T02D3057:112a-16: glog rgod pa'i sar btab na ser ba bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02D3057:112a-18: lhog pa kun la 'jim ba la sngags btab ste byugs na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3057:112a-21: yams gyi nad la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor
T02D3057:112a-22: bzhi ba la sngags stong phrag bdun bzlas la phyogs
T02D3057:112a-23: bzhir bcugs la snga dro'i dus su chu gtsang ma
T02D3057:112a-24: la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02D3057:112a-25: khang thog nas gtor na yams nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3057:112a-26: gtor ma gtong par 'dod pas bdag nyid dpal rta
T02D3057:112a-27: mgrin du bsgoms la snying gar hr'i: dmar po las
T02D3057:112a-28: 'od phyogs bcur 'phros pas sems can thams cad rta
T02D3057:112a-30: yang rta mgrin gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer phyogs
T02D3057:112a-31: bcur 'phros pas rta mgrin du gyur pa de gtor
T02D3057:112a-32: ma'i steng du spyan drangs te /
T02D3057:112a-33: gtor ma'i steng du bam dmar po cig bsam /
T02D3057:112a-35: slar bam la thim pas shel dmar po las grub
T02D3057:112a-36: pa'i rin po che'i snod yangs shing rgya che ba
T02D3057:112a-37: cig bsam / rang rta mgrin du bsgoms pa'i snying
T02D3057:112a-38: ga'i hr'i: dmar po de'i 'od nam mkha' la 'phros
T02D3057:112a-39: cig bsam / pas / hr'i: dkar dmar ser sngo /
T02D3057:112a-40: gnag 'od byung pas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun babs pas gang bar bsam /
T02D3057:112a-41: de nas gtor ma rnam par dag par bya ba'i
T02D3057:112a-42: phyir sarba ka ri zhes lan bdun brjod par bya'o
T02D3057:112a-43: // gtor ma nyid bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02D3057:112a-44: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa pa lo ki te /
T02D3057:112a-45: aom sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um zhes nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste /
T02D3057:112b-0: yang na sngags bdun tshan bzhi @112b brjod la chu la gdab bo //
T02D3057:112b-1: ye shes kyi chos skyong la nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya'o //
T02D3057:112b-2: phyogs skyong 'jig rten pa la yang sngags bdun tshan bzhi brjod do //
T02D3057:112b-3: yang na aom a'a: h'um hr'i: zhes nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod bar bya'o //
T02D3057:112b-4: 'phags pa rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
